original_text: Then he put the men in their proper places around the king. They all held their weapons in their hands. They stood in a line from the south side of the temple to the north side. They were around the altar at the front of the temple.
korean_text: 또 백성들에게 각각 손에 무기를 잡고 왕을 호위하되 성전 오른쪽에서부터 성전 왼쪽까지 제단과 성전 곁에 서게 하고

sentences.original_text: Then he put the men in their proper places
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 사람들을 적절한 자리에 두었다

sentences.original_text: They all held their weapons in their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 무기를 손에 들고 있었다

sentences.original_text: from the south side of the temple
at the front of the temple
